original_text: Also unto Shemaiah his son were sons born, that ruled throughout the house of their father: for they were mighty men of valour.
korean_text: 그의 아들 스마야도 두어 아들을 낳았으니 그들의 조상의 가문을 다스리는 자요 큰 용사라

sentences.original_text: Also unto Shemaiah his son were sons born
that ruled throughout the house of their father
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 아버지 집안 전체를 다스렸다

sentences.original_text: for they were mighty men of valour
